To the chief Musician<S>5329</S>, A Psalm<S>4210</S> for the sons<S>1121</S> of Korah<S>7141</S>. LORD<S>3068</S>, thou hast been favourable<S>7521</S> unto thy land<S>776</S>: thou hast brought back<S>7725</S> the captivity<S>7622</S> <S>7622</S> of Jacob<S>3290</S>. <sup>for the sons: or, of the sons</sup> <sup>favourable: or, well pleased</sup>
Thou hast forgiven<S>5375</S> the iniquity<S>5771</S> of thy people<S>5971</S>, thou hast covered<S>3680</S> all their sin<S>2403</S>. Selah<S>5542</S>.
Thou hast taken away<S>622</S> all thy wrath<S>5678</S>: thou hast turned<S>7725</S> thyself from the fierceness<S>2740</S> of thine anger<S>639</S>. <sup>thyself: or, thine anger from waxing hot</sup>
Turn<S>7725</S> us, O God<S>430</S> of our salvation<S>3468</S>, and cause thine anger<S>3708</S> toward us to cease<S>6565</S>.
Wilt thou be angry<S>599</S> with us for ever<S>5769</S>? wilt thou draw out<S>4900</S> thine anger<S>639</S> to all<S>1755</S> generations<S>1755</S>?
Wilt thou not revive<S>2421</S> us again<S>7725</S>: that thy people<S>5971</S> may rejoice<S>8055</S> in thee?
Shew<S>7200</S> us thy mercy<S>2617</S>, O LORD<S>3068</S>, and grant<S>5414</S> us thy salvation<S>3468</S>.
I will hear<S>8085</S> what God<S>410</S> the LORD<S>3068</S> will speak<S>1696</S>: for he will speak<S>1696</S> peace<S>7965</S> unto his people<S>5971</S>, and to his saints<S>2623</S>: but let them not turn again<S>7725</S> to folly<S>3690</S>.
Surely his salvation<S>3468</S> is nigh<S>7138</S> them that fear<S>3373</S> him; that glory<S>3519</S> may dwell<S>7931</S> in our land<S>776</S>.
Mercy<S>2617</S> and truth<S>571</S> are met together<S>6298</S>; righteousness<S>6664</S> and peace<S>7965</S> have kissed<S>5401</S> each other.
Truth<S>571</S> shall spring out<S>6779</S> of the earth<S>776</S>; and righteousness<S>6664</S> shall look down<S>8259</S> from heaven<S>8064</S>.
Yea, the LORD<S>3068</S> shall give<S>5414</S> that which is good<S>2896</S>; and our land<S>776</S> shall yield<S>5414</S> her increase<S>2981</S>.
Righteousness<S>6664</S> shall go<S>1980</S> before<S>6440</S> him; and shall set<S>7760</S> us in the way<S>1870</S> of his steps<S>6471</S>.
